thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Buffalo, NY
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Buffalo, NY

author: Buffalo, NY
title: Buffalo, NY
text:
We LOVE the 1000 piece collage puzzles, like cereal boxes and things I ate as a kid, games I played, ice cream, road signs, etc. we've bought 10 puzzles and it's fun to do as a family. The kids walk by and will sit and do some with us. It's relaxing.
Fast delivery, excellent quality.
Keep making new collage puzzles please!
